name: Omiga
description: Omiga is an innovative inscription protocol built on the CKB (Common Knowledge Base) blockchain, designed to provide a fairer and more efficient experience for minting and managing inscriptions. Developed by anonymous Nervos community members, Omiga aims to leverage CKB's unique Cell model to enhance L1 state usage, lock more CKB, and foster ecosystem growth through features like basic inscription issuance, an order book marketplace, blind box inscriptions, and PoW-based inscriptions. The project seeks to capitalize on the 2024 momentum around UTXO-based applications and Bitcoin Layer2 developments, positioning itself as an open protocol to drive broader adoption of CKB's capabilities.

highlights.title: First Inscription Protocol on CKB
highlights.description: Pioneering inscription protocol built on Nervos CKB

highlights.title: Fair Minting Mechanism
highlights.description: Equitable distribution with a fair minting process

highlights.title: Bitcoin Wallet Compatibility
highlights.description: Supports mainstream Bitcoin wallets like Unisat and OKX Web3

highlights.title: Full On-Chain Verification
highlights.description: Removing the need for centralized indexing, unlike inscription on Bitcoin

related.title: CKB Punks
related.desc: The first NFT collection on Nervos.

faq.a: Nervape is a multi-chain composable digital object (DOB) platform in the Nervos CKB ecosystem.

faq.q: How to get a Nervape DOB?
faq.a: You can mint or trade DOBs on the Nervape platform.
